name: Hoverbot Onslaught
description:
Defend the town from the incoming Hoverbot Onslaught. Though, your weapons won't be powerful enough on their own, Instead you have to use the Sol Cannon located in the middle of town to fire volleys towards the Mother Hoverbot.

This is a first Person shooter where the player is able to choose from a variety of weapons that are highly customization through the in game workbench.
